game.name: DCS: F-16C Sentry Pacific 2025 Campaign by SOB Simulations
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, Captions available, VR Support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Touch Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: Strap into the legendary Viper as an F-16 Test Pilot and join the Air National Guard’s Air Force Reserve Command Test Center (AATC) on deployment to the stunning Mariana Islands for Sentry Pacific 2025.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Strap into the legendary Viper as an F-16 Test Pilot and join the Air National Guard’s Air Force Reserve Command Test Center (AATC) on deployment to the stunning Mariana Islands for Sentry Pacific 2025.
